149.11: “…this is his name that he shall be called, The Lord is our righteousness.” (Jeremiah 23:6)
149.10: The Messiah, as it is written
149.13: “All around it amounts to 18,000; and the name of the city from that day will be "The Lord is There."” (Ezekiel 48:35)
149.7: R’ Shmuel bar Nachmani said in the name of R’ Yochanan:
149.9: The righteous, as we said above.
149.8: three are called by the name of the Holy One, and they are: the righteous, the Messiah and Jerusalem.
